description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Salmon With Chilli Potatoes & Cucumber Pickle recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fish dishes,Pescatarian,Roast,Low salt,Gluten free,Egg free,Low sugar,Potato,Microwave,High protein,Wheat free,Salmon
name: Spiced Salmon With Chilli Potatoes & Cucumber Pickle Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 Lebanese cucumbers, thinly sliced on the diagonal

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Prick potatoes with a fork. Microwave on high for 8-9 minutes or until just tender.

Combine chilli, chilli sauce, thyme, honey, 1 tsp salt and 1 tbs of the oil in a large bowl. Add potatoes and toss well to combine. Transfer to a baking paper lined baking tray and bake for 30 minutes or until golden.

Meanwhile, combine vinegar, sugar, mustard seeds, tsp salt and cup water in a saucepan. Stir over low heat until sugar dissolves. Place cucumber into a bowl and pour over hot liquid. Stand for 10 minutes.

Combine sumac, coriander, cinnamon and pepper with remaining oil in a bowl. Rub spice mixture all over salmon fillets. Heat a frying pan over medium heat, cook salmon for 2-3 minutes each side. Remove from pan and rest for 3 minutes. Drain cucumber.
Serve salmon with pickled cucumber and roast potatoes.
